ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:0.5_0: 3. The training rule on slapping with the palm of the hand
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.2_0: two nuns who were plagued by discontent entered their room and slapped their genitals with the palm of their hands.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.3_0: Hearing the sound, the nuns rushed to and asked them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.4_0: “Venerables, are you having sex with a man?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.5_0: “No, we’re not,” and they told them what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.7_0: “How can nuns slap their genitals with their hands?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did that?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.11_0: “How can nuns slap their genitals with their hands?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun slaps her genitals with the palm of her hand, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.1_0: Slaps her genitals with the palm of her hand:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.2_0: if, consenting to the contact, she hits her genitals, even with a lotus leaf, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.7_0: The third rule, the third training rule on fire, is finished.
